name: Capital City Bank Group, Inc.
description: Capital City Bank Group, Inc. is a bank holding company headquartered in Tallahassee, Florida, providing a wide range of banking and financial services through its subsidiary, Capital City Bank. Founded in 1895, the company has a long-standing tradition of serving its communities with high-quality financial products and services. Capital City Bank operates branches throughout Florida and Georgia, offering personal and business banking services, including checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. The bank emphasizes customer service and community involvement, aiming to foster long-term relationships with its clients. Its mission is to be the best community bank in the markets it serves, focusing on integrity, respect, and commitment to the customers and communities. Capital City Bank Group is committed to providing innovative financial solutions while maintaining strong financial health and a high level of customer satisfaction.

seo.meta_title: Capital City Bank Group, Inc. | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Capital City Bank Group, Inc., a leading community bank offering a range of banking and financial services in Florida and Georgia. Discover our commitment to customer service and community involvement.

faq.answer: Capital City Bank offers personal and business banking services, including checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services.

faq.question: Where is Capital City Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Capital City Bank is headquartered in Tallahassee, Florida, USA.

faq.question: When was Capital City Bank founded?
faq.answer: Capital City Bank was founded in 1895.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Capital City Bank?
faq.answer: The CEO of Capital City Bank Group, Inc. is William G. Smith Jr.
